comments.body: curious if you have a reason to switch from [ to [[, or if that is just what your fingers are used to.

while [ $ALL_RUNNING -ne 1 ]; do

comments.body: What about having the curl on line 58 retry several times?  That way, the test passes sooner sometimes, and doesn't flake if for some reason the images take more than 5s?

comments.body: As long as we're in here, can we switch this to use the -template flag and get rid of the jq dependency?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +50,54 @@  ALL_RUNNING=1

    if [ "$CURRENT_STATUS" != "true" ]; then
      ALL_RUNNING=0
